overview: One of the first babies born in captivity during the military dictatorship within the School of Mechanics of the Navy was Victoria Donda Pérez. The young woman discovers 30 years later that she was appropriated by a military man from the E.S.M.A. and that her parents are missing. Determined to know her true story, she builds a documentary portrait of her family where victims and repressors coexist to this day.
title: Victoria
